visualizations.title: Actual vs Predicted Values
visualizations.description: Perfect alignment of actual and predicted values with R²=1.0

visualizations.title: Residual Distribution
visualizations.description: Zero residuals indicating perfect model fit

visualizations.title: Area by Crop Type
visualizations.description: Comparison of actual vs predicted area by crop type

insights: Model achieved perfect accuracy (MAE=0, R²=1.0). Actual and predicted values are identical across all 5 samples. Residuals show zero variation. Predictions by crop type match actual values perfectly.
data.summary: The model demonstrates 100% accuracy with zero prediction error. While this confirms perfect alignment between actual and predicted values, such results are unusual in real-world agricultural data and suggest potential data quality issues or synthetic data. The model successfully captures production patterns across crop seasons but requires validation on new data.
data.task_answer: The analysis confirms the model can accurately compare regional production efficiency with 100% accuracy. The perfect alignment between actual and predicted values indicates the model successfully captures production patterns across crop seasons.
